# Prerequisites

The reader should have some basic knowledge of the following topics:


-   Statistical learning

    -   Train/ test split

    -   Cross-validation

    -   Overfitting
    
    -   Gradient descent
    
    -   Bias variance trade-off
    
    -   Hyperparameters

-   Regression trees and random forest models

-   Basic R knowledge (only for the applied part)
